column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////My boyfriend and I ordered: the Jinya Tonkotsu Black (2) but I ended up getting mine with thick noodles and they were very flexible with regards to changing it. I also ended up getting the Â Pork Gyoza and Salad. The Pork Gyoza wasn't anything special
column2: as for the salad the sauce was very different but it wasn't bad. Now for the Tonkotsu..... I absolutely adore it. The broth itself is so heartwarming and flavorful
column3: it makes your insides tingle. As for the Pork Chashu it was so succulent and savory. My boyfriend literally devoured the broth within seconds.
